select * from (select dense_rank() over(order by ct.community_created_at desc, ct.community_id desc) as community_number, ct.community_id, ct.community_user_id,
cut.user_id, cut.user_name, cut.user_profile_img_path,
ct.community_content, ct.created_at,
cit.community_img_id, cit.community_id as cit_community_id, cit.seq, cit.`path`,
ifnull(clt.community_like_id, 0) as is_like, ifnull(clc.like_count, 0) as like_count, ifnull(cc.comments_count, 0) as comments_count from community_tb ct left outer join user_tb cut on(cut.user_id = ct.community_user_id) left outer join community_img_tb cit on(cit.community_img_id = ct.community_id) left outer join community_like_tb clt on(clt.community_id = ct.community_id and clt.user_id = #{userId}) left outer join (select community_id, count(*) as like_count from community_like_tb group by community_id) clc on(clc.community_id = ct.community_id) left outer join (select community_id, count(*) as comments_count from community_comment_tb group by community_id) cc on(cc.community_id = ct.community_id) where ct.community_user_id = #{userId} order by ct.created_at desc, ct.community_id desc, cit.seq) communities where community_number between #{startIndex} + 1 and #{endIndex}

select ct.community_id, ct.community_user_id,
ut.user_id, ut.user_name, ut.profile_img_path,
ct.community_content, ct.community_created_at,
cit.community_img_id, cit.community_id, cit.seq, cit.`path`,
ifnull(clt.community_like_id, 0) as is_like, ifnull(clc.like_count, 0) as like_count from community_tb ct left outer join user_tb ut on(ut.user_id = ct.community_user_id) left outer join community_img_tb cit on(cit.community_id = ct.community_id) left outer join community_like_tb clt on(clt.community_id = ct.community_id and clt.user_id = #{userId}) left outer join (select community_id, count(*) as like_count from community_like_tb where community_id = #{communityId}) clc on(community_id = ct.community_id) where ct.community_id = #{communityId}
select count(*) from community_tb ct where ct.community_user_id = #{userId}
